original_text: The gatekeeper opens the gate for him, and the sheep listen to his voice. He calls his own sheep by name and leads them out.
korean_text: 문지기는 그를 위하여 문을 열고 양은 그의 음성을 듣나니 그가 자기 양의 이름을 각각 불러 인도하여 내느니라

sentences.original_text: The gatekeeper opens the gate for him
and the sheep listen to his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양들은 그의 목소리에 귀를 기울입니다

sentences.original_text: He calls his own sheep by name
